lesson.title_and_level: Intermediate - A Trip to the Dry Cleaner's

sentence.idiomatic: Does your coat need to be dry cleaned?
These clothes cannot be dry cleaned.
His clothes have been dry cleaned.
The size of this pair of shoes is perfect.
Let me look at what size these clothes are.
Is this clothing the right size?
The material is different, so the prices of the clothing are also different.
These fabric are good.
What material is this coat made of?
The trains' departure time is fixed.
The price of clothing in our shop is not fixed.
He has dinner at a set time every day.
Your suit looks nice.
He bought a suit.
There are many suits at this shop.
Do you have a woolen blanket?
The woolen blankets in their shop are beautiful.
We need a woolen blanket.
I forgot to get a receipt.
This is your receipt. Please take it.
Please present your receipt to pick up the photos three days later.
He works very carefully.
When you're finished please go over it carefully.
You must choose carefully when you're buying things.
When the test is finished please check that your name is on it.
Please check your information carefully.
They are checking the company's accounts.
You haven't signed your name yet.
Please sign here.
He forgot to sign his name.
On what grounds are you arresting me?
You can obtain your medicine with a doctor's prescription.
He succeed based on his hard work.
Hello, what can I help you with?
Hello, I would like some clothes to dry clean. Can you tell me how much it costs to dry clean one item?
Because the size of the clothes and the fabric are all different, the dry cleaning price is also not fixed. Can you let me have a look at the clothing first?
No problem. I have a coat, a suit, and a woolen blanket here.

OK. This medium-length coat will cost 28 yuan to dry clean; the suit costs 40 yuan. The woolen blanket is quite large, and washing it will be a bit more troublesome, so it will cost 120 yuan. Altogether it will cost 188 yuan. Here is your receipt. Please check it carefully, then sign your name at the lower right.
OK, thanks. So, when can I pick up the clothes?
A week later, you can bring in the receipt to pick up the clothes. You can also leave your contact information and address, and when it's been cleaned we can deliver it to your home.
Great, thanks.
